Verses: 1 karththarudaiya Vaarththai Enakku Undaagi, Avar:

2 nee Poi, Erusalemin Sevigal Ketkumpadik Kooppittu Sollavendiyadhu Ennavendraal: Vidhaikkappadaadha Dhesamaagiya Vanaandharaththile Nee Ennaip Pinpatrivandha Un Ilavayadhin Bakthiyaiyum, Nee Vaazhkkaippattapodhu Unakkirundha Nesaththaiyum Ninaiththirukkiren Endru Karththar Sollugiraar.
3 isravel Karththarukku Parisuththamum, Avarudaiya Vilaivin Mudharpalanumaayirundhadhu; Adhaip Patchiththa Yaavarum Kutravaaligalaanaargal; Pollaappu Avargalmel Vandhadhendru Karththar Sollugiraar.
4 yaakkobin Kudumbaththaare, Isravel Kudumbaththin Vamsangale, Neengalellaarum Karththarudaiya Vaarththaiyaik Kelungal.

5 karththar Sollugiradhu Ennavendraal: Engalai Egipthudhesaththilirundhu Varappanninavarum, Avaandharaveliyum, Pallangalumulla Dhesamum, Varatchiyum, Marana Irulumulla Dhesamum, Oruvanum, Kadavaamalum Oru Manushanum Kudiyiraamalum Irukkira Dhesamumaana Vanaandharaththil Engalai Nadaththinavarumaagiyakarththar Engeyendru Ungal Pidhaakkal Kelaamal,
6 ennaivittu Dhoorappattu, Maayaiyaip Pinpatri, Veenaraaip Pogiradharku Ennidaththil Enna Aniyaayaththaik Kandaargal?

7 sezhippaana Dhesaththin Kaniyaiyum Nanmaiyaiyum Saappidumpadikku Naan Ungalai Avvidaththukku Azhaiththukkondu Vandhen; Aanaalum Neengal Adharkul Pravesiththapodhu, En Dhesaththaith Theettuppaduththi, En Sudhandharaththai Aruvaruppaakkineergal.

8 karththar Engeyendru Aasaariyargal Sollaamalum, Vedhaththaip Podhikkiravargal Ennai Ariyaamalumirundhu, Meyppargal Enakku Dhrogampanninaargal; Theerkkadharisigal Paagaalaikkondu Theerkkadharisanancholli, Veenaanavaigalaip Pinpatrinaargal.
9 aadhalaal Innum Naan Ungalode Vazhakkaaduven, Ungal Pillaigalin Pillaigalodum Vazhakkaaduven Endru Karththar Sollugiraar.
10 neengal Kiththeemin Theevugalmattum Kadandhupoip Paarththu, Kedhaarukku Aal Anuppi Nandraai Visaariththu, Ippadippatta Kaariyam Undo Endrum,
11 endha Jaadhiyaavadhu Dhevargalallaadha Thangal Dhevargalai Maatrinadhu Undo Endrum Paarungal; En Janangalo Veenaanavaigalukkaagath Thangal Magimaiyai Maatrinaargal.
12 vaanangale, Idhinimiththam Bramiththuk Kondhaliththu, Migavum Thidukkidungal Endru Karththar Sollugiraar.
13 en Janangal Irandu Theemaigalai Seydhaargal; Jeevaththanneer Ootraagiya Ennai Vittuvittaargal; Thanneer Nirkaadha Thottigalaagiya Vedippulla Thottigalai Thangalukku Vettikkondaargal.
14 isravel Oru Velaikkaarano? Avan Veettil Pirandha Adimaiyo? En Kollaiyaanaan?
15 paalasingangal Avanmel Kerchchiththu, Muzhangi, Avan Dhesaththaip Paazhaakkivittana; Avan Pattanangal Kudiyiraamal Sutterikkappattana.
16 nop, Thagabaanes Ennum Pattanangalin Puththirarum, Un Uchchandhalaiyai Norukkinaargal.
17 un Dhevanaagiya Karththar Unnai Vazhiyile Nadaththikkondupogunkaalaththil, Nee Avarai Vittuppogiradhinaal Allavo Unakku Neridappanninaai?

18 ippodhum Seekorin Thanneeraik Kudippadharku Egipthukkup Pogiradhinaal Unakkup Prayojanam Enna? Aippiraaththu Nadhiyin Thanneeraik Kudippadharku Aseeriyaavukkup Pogiradhinaal Unakkup Prayojanam Enna?

19 un Theemai Unnai Dhandikkum, Un Maarupaadugal Unnaik Kandikkum; Nee Un Dhevanaagiya Karththarai Vidugiradhum, Ennaip Patrum Bayam Unnidaththil Illaamalirukkiradhum, Eththanai Pollaappum Kasappumaana Kaariyam Endru Unarndhukol Endru Senaigalin Karththaraagiya Aandavar Sollugiraar.

20 poorvakaalanthuvakki Naan Un Nugaththadiyai Muriththu, Un Kattugalai Aruththen; Naan Adimaippaduvadhillai Endru Neeyum Sonnaaye; Aagilum, Uyaramaana Sagala Mettinmelum, Pachchaiyaana Sagalamaraththinkeezhum Nee Vesiyaaith Thirigiraai.
21 naan Unnai Mutrilum Narkanitharum Uyarkulath Dhraatchachchediyaaga Naattinen; Nee Enakkuk Kaattuththraatchachchediyin Aagaadha Kodigalaai Maaripponadhu Enna?
22 nee Unnai Uvarmanninaale Kazhuvi, Adhiga Savukkaaraththaik Kaiyaadinaalum Un Akkiramaththin Karaigal Enakku Munbaaga Irukkumendru Karththaraagiya Aandavar Sollugiraar.

23 naan Theettuppadavillai; Naan Paagaalgalaip Pinpatravillai Endru Nee Eppadi Sollugiraai? Pallaththaakkile Nee Nadakkira Maarkkaththaip Paar; Nee Seydhadhai Unarndhukol; Thaarumaaraai Odugira Vegamaana Pennottagam Nee.

24 vanaandharaththile Pazhaginadhum, Than Ichchaiyin Madhaveriyile Kaatrai Utkollugiradhumaana Kaattukkazhudhai Nee; Adhin Aavalai Niruththi, Adhaith Thiruppugiravan Yaar? Adhaith Thedugiravargal Oruvarum Varuththappadavendiyadhillai; Adhin Maasaththil Adhaik Kandupidippaargal.

25 un Kaal Verunkaalaagaadhapadikkum, Un Thondai Varatchiyadaiyaadhapadikkum Adakkikkol Endraal Nee: Adhu Koodaadhakaariyam; Naan Appadi Seyyamaatten; Anniyarai Nesikkiren; Avargal Pirage Poven Engiraai.

26 thirudan Adappadugirapodhu Eppadi Vetkappadugiraano, Appadiye Isravel Vamsaththaar Vetkappaduvaargal; Kattaiyaip Paarththu, Nee En Thagappan Endrum; Kallaippaarththu, Nee Ennaip Petraai Endrum Sollugira Avargalum, Avargal Raajaakkalum, Avargal Prabukkalum, Avargal Aasaariyargalum, Avargal Theerkkadharisigalum Vetkappaduvaargal.
27 avargal Thangal Mugaththaiyalla, Thangal Mudhugai Enakkuk Kaattinaargal; Thangal Aabaththukkaalaththilo Ezhundhu Engalai Ratchiyum Engiraargal.
28 nee Unakku Undupannina Dhevargal Enge? Un Aabaththukkaalaththil Unnai Ratchikkakkoodumaanaal Avaigal Ezhumbattum; Yoodhaave, Un Pattanangalin Lakkamum, Un Dhevargalin Lakkamum Sari.
29 ennode Neengal Vazhakkaaduvaanen? Neengal Anaivarum Enakku Virodhamaai Dhrogampannineergal Endru Karththar Sollugiraar.
30 naan Ungal Pillaigalai Adiththadhu Virudhaa; Sitchaiyai Etrukkollaamarponaargal; Azhikkira Singaththaippola Ungal Pattayam Ungal Theerkkagarisigalaip Patchiththadhu.

31 sandhadhiyaare, Neengal Karththarudaiya Vaarththaiyai Sindhiththuppaarungal; Naan Isravelukku Vanaandharamum, Kaarirulaana Boomiyumaaga Irundheno? Pinnai En En Janangal; Naangale Ejamaangal, Ini Ummidaththil Naangal Varuvadhillaiyendru Sollugiraargal.
32 oru Pen Than Aabaranaththaiyum, Oru Manavaatti Than Aadaigalaiyum Marappaalo? En Janangalo Ennimudiyaadha Naatkalaai Ennai Marandhuvittaargal.
33 nesaththaith Thedumpadikku Nee Un Vazhigalai Nayappaduththugiradhenna? Ivvidhamaai Nee Pollaadha Sthreegalukkum Un Vazhigalaik Katrukkoduththaai.

34 un Vasthira Orangalilum Kutramillaadha Ezhai Aaththumaakkalin Raththam Kaanappadugiradhu; Adhaith Thondith Thedugiradhinaal Alla, Adhu Ellaavatrinmelum Veliyaayirukkiradhinaal Adhaik Kandupidiththen.
35 aagilum: Kutramillaadhirukkiren Endrum, Avarudaiya Kobam Ennaivittuth Thirumbitru Endrum Sollugiraai; Idho, Naan Paavancheyyavillaiyendru Nee Sollugiradhinimiththam Naan Unnode Vazhakkaaduven.
36 nee Un Vazhiyai Maatrimaatri Ivvalavaai Vilagip Pogiradhu Enna? Nee Aseeriyaavinaal Vetkipponadhupola Egipthinaalum Vetkippovaai.
37 nee Un Kaigalai Un Thalaiyinmel Vaiththukkondu Ivvidaththilirundhu Purappattuppovaai; Enenil, Un Nambikkaigalaik Karththarveruththirukkiraar; Avaigalaal Unakkuk Kaariyam Vaaikkaadhu.
